channel.title: Social Media on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Social Media on Ex Machina

item.title: The New News
item.description: The Internet has radically transformed the way in which the news reaches us. The news organisations that used to assume the role of gatekeepers of news content are no longer in control of what we get to see. But can social media companies that have enabled citizen journalism assume the responsibility that news organisations used to display.
